  • Method Details

    • getMotherNaturePosition

      public Island getMotherNaturePosition()
      Returns:
      The island on which there is Mother Nature

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      This is a one-time method, it creates islands, set Mother Nature on a random one and put a student on each island, excluding the one with Mother Nature and the opposite one

    • getIslands

      public ArrayList<Island> getIslands()
      Returns:
      Islands in the game in a certain time

    • setNoTowerFlag

      public void setNoTowerFlag()
      Set the flag to disable tower effect in checkConqueror

    • uniteIfPossible

      public void uniteIfPossible(Island island)
      The method checks if an island has next to it another island (or islands) with the same color of tower, if yes then they will be merged in Island with index islandId and others are eliminated
      Parameters:
      island - It's needed to point to the island where there is MotherNature
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When islandId doesn't identify an island

    • checkConqueror

      public void checkConqueror(Island island, ArrayList<Player> players) throws WinningException
      The method check which player has the most students on the island, a player have students of one color when he controls their professor. Each player has a towerColor and the tower means who is controlling it. Switches of conqueror(and of towers) are possible.
      Parameters:
      island - The island in the array we are looking to
      players - It's the ArrayList of all players, it gives the access to all boards
      Throws:
      WinningException

    • motherNatureActionNoMovement

      public void motherNatureActionNoMovement(Island island, ArrayList<Player> players) throws WinningException
      It's a method that call checkConqueror and uniteIfPossible on a certain island (where there isn't Mother Nature)
      Parameters:
      island - The island where Mother Nature is
      players - The players in the game
      Throws:
      WinningException

    • motherNatureActionMovement

      public void motherNatureActionMovement(int destinationIslandId, ArrayList<Player> players) throws MNmovementWrongException, WinningException
      This method is used for moving Mother Nature and use checkConqueror and uniteIfPossible
      Parameters:
      destinationIslandId - It's the island where you want to move Mother Nature
      players - The list of all players
      Throws:
      MNmovementWrongException - If the movement can't be performed.
      WinningException

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Island island) throws MNmovementWrongException
      This method is used for moving Mother Nature
      Parameters:
      island - It's the island where you want to move Mother Nature
      Throws:
      MNmovementWrongException - If the movement can't be performed.

    • setDisabledColorFlag

      public void setDisabledColorFlag(FactionColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - It's the color to be disabled on an island's conquer, it's basically a flag

    • setPowerBonusFlag

      public void setPowerBonusFlag(int power)
      Parameters:
      power - It's the "bonus" for affinity calculation for the current player

    • resetFlags

      public void resetFlags()
      It deletes all effects of flags

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - It's the player who is currently playing

    • setAdditionalMNFlag

      public void setAdditionalMNFlag(int num)
      Parameters:
      num - It's an increase for Mother Nature movement, based on the assistant played

    • setStateCharacterNoEntryTile

      public void setStateCharacterNoEntryTile(State state)
      Parameters:
      state - A character's state linked to all islands
